name: Remnants (itch) (HelloIsaac)
description:
Remnants is a game about slowly uncovering the events which led to an apocalypse. It takes about 25 minutes of your time.

< Controls >

WASD to move, I for Inventory, E to Pick Up items, L for Flashlight.

< Credits >

Jonathan Palmer: Lead Programmer, Level Designer

Isaac BD: Composer, Lead Level Designer, Programmer, Writer

< Release Notes >

We rushed to get this done for the Isolation Game Jam. More polish, more features, and some music will be coming in the next update.

< Known Bugs >

  1. Critical issue with inventory not updating. Gonna fix ASAP. 
  2. Issue with stuttering which will be addressed.
  3. Inventory doesn't open the first time when I is pressed. This is being looked into. In the meantime a work around is pressing I again which will bring it out.
  4. Lighting issue in cave for some reason causes the lights to turn on and off depending on the direction the player is facing. This is being looked into.
